classes.name: RunnableEntity
classes.note: A RunnableEntity represents the smallest code-fragment that is provided by an AtomicSwComponent Type and are executed under control of the RTE. RunnableEntities are for instance set up to respond to data reception or operation invocation on a server.

argument.note: This represents the formal definition of a an argument to a RunnableEntity.

classes.name: SwcInternalBehavior
classes.note: The SwcInternalBehavior of an AtomicSwComponentType describes the relevant aspects of the software-component with respect to the RTE, i.e. the RunnableEntities and the RTEEvents they respond to.

classes.name: SwcExclusiveAreaPolicy
